message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $13,000.  This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see a return on your investment.
I understand that you think the product is worth it, but I'm still not convinced. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $12,000 for the product.
